programme.title: Hong Kong Football Festival: Liverpool FC vs AC Milan
programme.desc: This July 2025, four of the world’s top football clubs, Liverpool FC, AC Milan, Arsenal and Tottenham Hotspur, are set to make history at the Hong Kong Football Festival 2025 (HKFF), hosted at Kai Tak Stadium. A legendary rival reignites as Liverpool FC and AC Milan will face off once again. The two European giants have a storied history, including unforgettable UEFA Champions League Finals in 2005 and 2007, with each club securing one victory. Arsenal vs Tottenham Hotspur, will mark the first-ever North London Derby— one of football’s fiercest rivalries— played outside of the UK.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Deadly Desire
programme.desc: When an Istanbul real estate manager is burned alive in his car, Inspector Mehmet Özakin has to dig into a maze of corruption and fraud to try and piece together the deadly puzzle - and almost becomes a victim himself.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: Empty Nets
programme.desc: Amir loves Narges and Narges loves Amir. But their hopes and dreams for a life together collide head on with the web of tradition, corruption, and social hierarchy that continues to rule over the lives of a new generation in Iran.

programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: The Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: Elise is beautiful, funny, and blind. Theo is a seducer but a loser. They love music. But when they meet in the elevator, it's hate at first sight.

programme.title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking - A True Love Story
programme.desc: Great cook Haru has married into the legendary “Kitchen Samurai” family. But her husband who is the successor of the Funaki family cannot cook at all. Haru makes a vow to make him a superb samurai chef and starts teaching her new husband how to cook.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Abandoned Skies
programme.desc: A cargo plane pilot is trapped alone with his plane in Earth orbit due to a nuclear war. Until one day he found someone else’s connection in space.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: Ghost Mountaineer
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, a group of Estonian students go hiking in Siberia. After their unpopular leader Olle vanishes, his rival Eero leads the group to seek help, and a series of bizarre and terrifying events unfold.
